page.title: 07RESIDENTIAL HOME SEER GREEN
page.content: The Princess Marina Centre is for physi cally handicapped people.There are 53 residents living there,each with their own room.The centre was built 30 years ago on the site which was originally Ponds Farm,the farm buildings having been incorporated into the design of the complex.The residents move around in wheelchairs which they operate with their feet or hands.They may choose from a wide range of activities:yoga, woodwork,basketry,collage,knitting,sew- ing,pottery,painting,cooking,gardening, French,history,English,literature,play- reading and computers.The swimming pool has recently been opened complete with jacuzzi.The water is kept at 96 degrees Fahrenheit.Hydrotherapy is used to improve muscle tone and the action of the jacuzzi relaxes the body and increases circulation.
